===Overview===
The '''Hellfire Cult''' was an anti-[[mutant]] activist group formed by the [[Madelyne Pryor (Earth-616)|Red Queen]] of the [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]] and the self hating mutant; [[Manuel de la Rocha (Earth-616)|Empath]] of the [[Hellions (Earth-616)|Hellions]].{{r|Uncanny X-Men #502}} The members wore the psychic blocking masks used by the [[Hellfire Knights (Earth-616)|Hellfire Knights]] the private security of the Hellfire Club.{{r|Uncanny X-Men #500}}

===Events===
Since the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and lot of the remaining powered or depowered mutants had moved to [[San Francisco]], a number of anti-mutant activists, known as the Hellfire Cult, began bashing any mutants and "species traitors" they encounter. Eventually, their activities drew the attention of the X-Men.{{r|Uncanny X-Men #501|503}}
